ADVANCED_RESTART_TEST.desc: Configure an entry in ADVANCED_RESTART table.

ADVANCED_RESTART_WITH_MUST_CONDITION_FAI.desc: Configuration of bgp eoiu with incorrect module name.
eStr: bgp_eoiu is only supported for module bgp

ADVANCED_RESTART_WITH_MUST_CONDITION_FAI.desc: Configuration of bgp timer with incorrect module name.
eStr: bgp_timer is only supported for module bgp

ADVANCED_RESTART_WITH_MUST_CONDITION_FAI.desc: Configuration of teamsyncd timer with incorrect module name.
eStr: teamsyncd_timer is only supported for module teamd

ADVANCED_RESTART_WITH_MUST_CONDITION_FAI.desc: Configuration of neighsyncd timer with incorrect module name.
eStr: neighsyncd_timer is only supported for module swss

ADVANCED_RESTART_TEST_WITH_INCORRECT_BGP.desc: Configure Advanced restart for bgp module with an out of range bgp timer.

ADVANCED_RESTART_TEST_WITH_INCORRECT_TEA.desc: Configure Advanced restart for teamsyncd module with an out of range teamsyncd timer.

ADVANCED_RESTART_TEST_WITH_INCORRECT_NEI.desc: Configure Advanced restart for neighsyncd module with an out of range neighsyncd timer.
